articles.title: United States set to lift travel ban for vaccinated South Africans - BusinessTech

articles.title: Covid-19 has now killed as many Americans as the 1918-19 flu pandemic - The Guardian
articles.description: More than 1,900 people are dying in the US daily on average – the highest level since early March
articles.content:
Covid-19 has now killed as many Americans as the 1918-19 flu pandemic, with more than 675,000 reported deaths.
